General.Name: China Development Financial Holding Corp
General.Description: China Development Financial Holding Corporation engages in the commercial banking, securities, venture capital, and insurance businesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers financial services, such as deposits, remittances, loans, payments, credit cards, investments, and wealth management, as well as financial solutions for domestic and overseas corporates. It also provides corporate banking services, including financial services for startups, micro-enterprises, SMEs, large enterprises, and private equities; upstream, midstream, and downstream supplier services; project financing products; cross-border trade businesses; short-term financing with supply chain cash flow, sustainable/green energy project financing, and asset-backed loans; corporate strategic services comprising credits, foreign exchange hedging, cash management, and trade financing; and currency, foreign exchange, interest rate, commodity, and equity security of spot market and derivative financial product trading. In addition, the company offers personal life insurance, personal injury insurance, personal health insurance, interest rate variable annuity, traditional annuity insurance, travel safety insurance, investment insurance, group insurance, and universal insurance products; retail brokerage and wealth management, investment banking, fixed income, derivatives, registry and transfer agency, and proprietary trading services; asset management services; and installment/business equipment leasing services. China Development Financial Holding Corporation was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 135, Dunhua N. Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 105
